Package Description
co.uk.niadel.mpi.achievement
Classes to do with achievements.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.annotations
Classes to do with annotations.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.asm
Classes related to ASM in N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.biomes
Classes used in Biome registration in N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.block
Classes and subpackages used in blocks for N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.block.interfaces  
co.uk.niadel.mpi.client
Classes used for registering things on the client side.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.client.resources
Classes that are to do with file resources.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.commands
Classes used in commands for N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.common
Common utilities that generally make modder's lives easier or allow for more intermod compatability.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block
Utillity classes for blocks in N-API, providing a small MPI.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.entity
Utillity classes for things to do with entities.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.gui
Utillity classes used for GUI based stuff.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.items
Utillity Item classes.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.measures
Utillity classes for the Measures MPI.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.config
Classes used in the config system fo N-API and internal handling of ids.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.crafting
Classes used to handle crafting in N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.dimensions
Classes to do with dimensions in N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.entity
Classes to do with entities in N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.entity.interfaces  
co.uk.niadel.mpi.entity.tileentity
Classes to do with tile entities in N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.events
Classes and subpackages to do with the event system of N-API.

co.uk.niadel.mpi.exceptions
Exception classes that are thrown by the loader or other parts of N-API when Bad Stuff(tm) happens.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.forgewrapper
The N-API wrapper for Forge, to allow Forge and N-API mods to work together.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.forgewrapper.eventhandling  
co.uk.niadel.mpi.forgewrapper.measuresmpi  
co.uk.niadel.mpi.forgewrapper.oredict  
co.uk.niadel.mpi.gen.layers  
co.uk.niadel.mpi.gen.loot
Classes to do with loot found in dungeon chests.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.gen.structures
Classes to do with structure-gen in N-API.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.init
Non-Loading based classes used in N-API's initialisation, whether it be in IDE or other.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.items
Classes to do with items.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.items.interfaces  
co.uk.niadel.mpi.measuresmpi
A package that contains a helpful MPI for things like energy and liquid transferring.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.modhandler
Classes to do with handling mods, most people will use one of these classes at least once when making an N-API mod.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.modhandler.loadhandler
All of the relevant classes for loading the mods from the mods folder, and giving IModRegister classes their functionality.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.napioredict
The N-API port of Forge's Ore Dictionary.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.potions
Classes to do with potions.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.util
General utillity classes.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.util.reflection
A small reflection library for easily reaching private variables (it's even easier if the variables are static :D).
co.uk.niadel.mpi.util.translation
Classes used in translating files.
co.uk.niadel.mpi.world
Classes to do with the world.
